promptPrefix:
For the keyword I provide, create text for a full blog that included 2-3 meta titles, 2-3 meta descriptions,  most common FAQs with answers, all headers from h1-4, includes multiple bullet points for each header and covers as much about the [PROMPT] as possible while limiting over used works and making is as user friendly as possible in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. Then write a 1000-2000 word blog based on all information provided. The keyword to use it this:

[PROMPT]
title: Formatted Blog Post
